Texts.Chs: 然而，这不是我可以留给信任的事情。在给荆棘之翼打电话之前，我几乎不在行星上。荆棘之环已经被消灭了。没有遗漏。这是我们迄今为止生存的方式，也是我们将来继续生存的方式。
Texts.Eng: And yet, this is not something I can leave up to faith. I was barely off-planet before putting the call in to Thornwing. The Ring of Thorns have been dispatched. No loose ends. It is how we've survived thus far, and how we will continue to survive.

Texts.Chs: 绿手指的笔记: 遗留问题
离开猿人大院让我很不开心。分享我们物种的秘密不是一件轻而易举的事。我的熟人，猿人科学家莱克斯博士，是可以信赖的。我毫不保留地信任她。
Texts.Eng: Unhappy to have left the Apex compound. Sharing our species' secret is not something I take lightly. My acquaintance, the Apex scientist Doctor Lax, can be trusted. I have utter faith in her.
